chapter.title: Play
chapter.screen:
cd /usr/local/src/
wget http://downloads.typesafe.com/typesafe-activator/1.3.2/typesafe-activator-1.3.2-minimal.zip
unzip typesafe-activator-1.3.2-minimal.zip
mv activator-1.3.2-minimal /srv/ ln -s activator-1.3.2-minimal /srv/activator
cat >> /etc/profile.d/activator.sh <<'EOF' export PATH=$PATH:/srv/activator EOF
chapter.para: 首次运行会下载所需的包
